verses.verse: <S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> and to his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%>
Saying <S%G3004><s%> The <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2523>sit<s%> in <S%G3475>Moses'<s%> seat: <S%G2515><s%>

<S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> whatever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> they <S%G2036>bid<s%> you observe, <S%G5083><s%> that <S%G5083>observe<s%> and <S%G4160>do;<s%> but <S%G4160>do<s%> not you <S%G2596>after<s%> their <S%G2041>works:<s%> for they <S%G3004>say,<s%> and <S%G4160>do<s%> not.

For they <S%G1195>bind<s%> <S%G926>heavy<s%> <S%G5413>burdens<s%> and <S%G1418>grievous<s%> to be <S%G1418>borne,<s%> and lay <S%G2007><s%> them <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G444>men's<s%> <S%G5606>shoulders;<s%> but they themselves <S%G2309>will<s%> not <S%G2795>move<s%> them with one of their fingers. <S%G1147><s%>

But <S%G3956>all<s%> their <S%G2041>works<s%> they <S%G4160>do<s%> for to be <S%G2300>seen<s%> of <S%G444>men:<s%> they <S%G4115>make<s%> <S%G4115>broad<s%> their <S%G5440>phylacteries,<s%> and <S%G3170>enlarge<s%> the <S%G2899>borders<s%> of their garments, <S%G2440><s%>
And <S%G5368>love<s%> the <S%G4411>uppermost<s%> <S%G4411>rooms<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G1173>feasts,<s%> and the <S%G4410>chief<s%> <S%G4410>seats<s%> in the synagogues, <S%G4864><s%>
And <S%G783>greetings<s%> in the <S%G58>markets,<s%> and to be <S%G2564>called<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> <S%G4461>Rabbi,<s%> Rabbi. <S%G4461><s%>
But be not you <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G4461>Rabbi:<s%> for <S%G1520>one<s%> is <S%G5216>your<s%> Master, <S%G2519><s%> even <S%G5547>Christ;<s%> and <S%G3956>all<s%> you are brothers. <S%G80><s%>

And <S%G2564>call<s%> no <S%G3361><s%> man <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>father<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth:<s%> for <S%G1520>one<s%> is <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3962>Father,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in heaven. <S%G3772><s%>
<S%G3366>Neither<s%> be you <S%G2564>called<s%> <S%G2519>masters:<s%> for <S%G1520>one<s%> is <S%G5216>your<s%> Master, <S%G2519><s%> even Christ. <S%G5547><s%>
But he that is <S%G3187>greatest<s%> among you shall be <S%G5216>your<s%> servant. <S%G1249><s%>
And <S%G3748>whoever<s%> shall <S%G5312>exalt<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> shall be <S%G5013>abased;<s%> and he that shall <S%G5013>humble<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> shall be exalted. <S%G5312><s%>

But <S%G3759>woe<s%> to you, <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G5273>hypocrites!<s%> for you <S%G2808>shut<s%> up the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1715>against<s%> <S%G444>men:<s%> for you <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G1525>go<s%> in yourselves, <S%G3756>neither<s%> <S%G863>suffer<s%> you them that are <S%G1525>entering<s%> to <S%G1525>go<s%> in.

<S%G3759>Woe<s%> to you, <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G5273>hypocrites!<s%> for you <S%G2719>devour<s%> <S%G5503>widows'<s%> <S%G3614>houses,<s%> and for a <S%G4392>pretense<s%> <S%G4336>make<s%> <S%G3117>long<s%> <S%G4336>prayer:<s%> therefore <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> you shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G4055>greater<s%> damnation. <S%G2917><s%>

<S%G3759>Woe<s%> to you, <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G5273>hypocrites!<s%> for you <S%G4013>compass<s%> <S%G2281>sea<s%> and <S%G3584>land<s%> to <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G4339>proselyte,<s%> and <S%G3752>when<s%> he is <S%G1096>made,<s%> you <S%G4160>make<s%> him <S%G1366>twofold<s%> more the <S%G5207>child<s%> of <S%G1067>hell<s%> than yourselves. <S%G5216><s%>

<S%G3759>Woe<s%> to you, you <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G3595>guides,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3004>say,<s%> Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall <S%G3660>swear<s%> by the <S%G3485>temple,<s%> it is <S%G3762>nothing;<s%> but whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> shall <S%G3660>swear<s%> by the <S%G5557>gold<s%> of the <S%G3485>temple,<s%> he is a debtor! <S%G3784><s%>

You <S%G3474>fools<s%> and <S%G5185>blind:<s%> for <S%G5101>whether<s%> is <S%G3187>greater,<s%> the <S%G5557>gold,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> that <S%G37>sanctifies<s%> the gold? <S%G5557><s%>

And, Whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall <S%G3660>swear<s%> by the <S%G2379>altar,<s%> it is <S%G3762>nothing;<s%> but whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G302><s%> <S%G3660>swears<s%> by the <S%G1435>gift<s%> that is on it, he is guilty. <S%G3784><s%>

You <S%G3474>fools<s%> and <S%G5185>blind:<s%> for whether <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G3187>greater,<s%> the <S%G1435>gift,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> the <S%G2379>altar<s%> that <S%G37>sanctifies<s%> the gift? <S%G1435><s%>
<S%G3588>Whoever<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> shall <S%G3660>swear<s%> by the <S%G2379>altar,<s%> <S%G3660>swears<s%> by it, and by <S%G3956>all<s%> things thereon. <S%G1883><s%> <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G3588>whoever<s%> shall <S%G3660>swear<s%> by the <S%G3485>temple,<s%> <S%G3660>swears<s%> by it, and by him that <S%G2730>dwells<s%> therein.
And he that shall <S%G3660>swear<s%> by <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G3660>swears<s%> by the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> and by him that <S%G2521>sits<s%> thereon. <S%G1883><s%> <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3759>Woe<s%> to you, <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G5273>hypocrites!<s%> for you <S%G586>pay<s%> <S%G586>tithe<s%> of <S%G2238>mint<s%> and <S%G432>anise<s%> and <S%G2951>cummin,<s%> and have <S%G863>omitted<s%> the weightier <S%G926><s%> matters of the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G2920>judgment,<s%> <S%G1656>mercy,<s%> and <S%G4102>faith:<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G1163>ought<s%> you to have <S%G4160>done,<s%> and not to <S%G863>leave<s%> the <S%G2548>other<s%> undone.
You <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G3595>guides,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1368>strain<s%> <S%G1368>at<s%> a <S%G2971>gnat,<s%> and <S%G2666>swallow<s%> a camel. <S%G2574><s%>

<S%G3759>Woe<s%> to you, <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G5273>hypocrites!<s%> for you <S%G2511>make<s%> <S%G2511>clean<s%> the <S%G1855>outside<s%> of the <S%G4221>cup<s%> and of the <S%G3953>platter,<s%> but <S%G2081>within<s%> they are <S%G1073>full<s%> of <S%G724>extortion<s%> and excess. <S%G192><s%>

You <S%G5185>blind<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisee,<s%> <S%G2511>cleanse<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> that <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1787>within<s%> the <S%G4221>cup<s%> and <S%G3953>platter,<s%> that the <S%G1622>outside<s%> of them may be <S%G2513>clean<s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>

<S%G3759>Woe<s%> to you, <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G5273>hypocrites!<s%> for you are <S%G3945>like<s%> to white <S%G2867>washed<s%> <S%G5028>sepulchers,<s%> <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G3303>indeed<s%> <S%G5316>appear<s%> <S%G5611>beautiful<s%> <S%G1855>outward,<s%> but are <S%G2081>within<s%> <S%G1073>full<s%> of dead <S%G3498><s%> men's <S%G3747>bones,<s%> and of <S%G3956>all<s%> uncleanness. <S%G167><s%>

Even <S%G3779>so<s%> you <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1855>outwardly<s%> <S%G5316>appear<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%> to <S%G444>men,<s%> but <S%G2081>within<s%> you are <S%G3324>full<s%> of <S%G5272>hypocrisy<s%> and iniquity. <S%G458><s%>

<S%G3759>Woe<s%> to you, <S%G1122>scribes<s%> and <S%G5330>Pharisees,<s%> <S%G5273>hypocrites!<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you <S%G3618>build<s%> the <S%G5028>tombs<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> and <S%G2885>garnish<s%> the <S%G3419>sepulchers<s%> of the righteous, <S%G1342><s%>

And <S%G3004>say,<s%> <S%G1487>If<s%> we had <S%G2258>been<s%> in the <S%G2250>days<s%> of our <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> we would not have <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G2844>partakers<s%> with them in the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>
<S%G5620>Why<s%> you be <S%G3140>witnesses<s%> to <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> that you are the <S%G5207>children<s%> of them which <S%G5407>killed<s%> the prophets. <S%G4396><s%>
<S%G4137>Fill<s%> you up <S%G2532>then<s%> the <S%G3358>measure<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> fathers. <S%G3962><s%>
You serpents, <S%G3789><s%> you <S%G1081>generation<s%> of <S%G2191>vipers,<s%> <S%G4459>how<s%> can you escape <S%G5343><s%> <S%G575><s%> the <S%G2920>damnation<s%> of hell? <S%G1067><s%>

Why, <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2400>behold,<s%> I <S%G649>send<s%> to you <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> and <S%G4680>wise<s%> men, and <S%G1122>scribes:<s%> and some of them you shall <S%G615>kill<s%> and <S%G4717>crucify;<s%> and some of them shall you <S%G3146>whip<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> and persecute <S%G1377><s%> them from <S%G4172>city<s%> to city: <S%G4172><s%>

That on you may <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G1632>shed<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> from the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G1342>righteous<s%> <S%G6>Abel<s%> to the <S%G129>blood<s%> of <S%G2197>Zacharias<s%> <S%G5207>son<s%> of <S%G914>Barachias,<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> you <S%G5407>slew<s%> <S%G3342>between<s%> the <S%G3485>temple<s%> and the altar. <S%G2379><s%>
<S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things shall <S%G2240>come<s%> on <S%G5026>this<s%> generation. <S%G1074><s%>

O <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> you that <S%G615>kill<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> and <S%G3036>stone<s%> them which are <S%G649>sent<s%> to you, how <S%G4212>often<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%> I have <S%G1996>gathered<s%> your <S%G5043>children<s%> <S%G1996>together,<s%> even <S%G3739><s%> <S%G5158><s%> as a <S%G3733>hen<s%> <S%G1996>gathers<s%> her <S%G3556>chickens<s%> under <S%G5259><s%> her <S%G4420>wings,<s%> and you <S%G2309>would<s%> not!
<S%G2400>Behold,<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3624>house<s%> is <S%G863>left<s%> to you desolate. <S%G2048><s%>

For I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, You shall not <S%G1492>see<s%> me from now on, <S%G575><s%> <S%G737><s%> <S%G2193>till<s%> you shall <S%G2036>say,<s%> Blessed <S%G2127><s%> is he that <S%G2064>comes<s%> in the <S%G3686>name<s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
